title: The Story of Rett Pott - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Tragedy
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Unconditional Love   Wars
author: Yayoi   弥生
description:
Rett Pot fell in love.

It was during the entrance ceremony of Teito Daiichi Military school. For Rett, who was just sixteen years old, the welcoming dance performance, enhanced with military arts and performed by his seniors,  proved exceedingly wondrous and captivating.

Amongst all the magnificent performances, the martial arts dances performed by the students ranked one and two especially took his breath away, held his gaze captive.

Rett Pot couldn't help but fall in love.
>
